entities.name: NVIDIA CORPORATION
entities.description: NVIDIA Corporation is a technology company that designs and sells graphics processing units (GPUs) for gaming and professional markets, as well as system on a chip units (SoCs) for the mobile computing and automotive market.

entities.name: SUBSIDIARIES
entities.description: Subsidiaries are companies controlled by NVIDIA Corporation, which are consolidated in the financial statements.

relationships.relationship_description: NVIDIA Corporation consolidates the financial statements of its subsidiaries.
